page.title: 04Whippet Racing
page.content: WHEN YOUR WIPPET IS OLD ENOUGH TO GO OUT YOU TAKE IT RUNNING.YOU TAKE YOUR DOG OUT AFTER RABBITS.YOU DO THAT A FEW TMES AND WHEN IT IS FAST ENOUGH YOU TAKE IT TO A RACING GROUND.YOU TAKE IT TO TRIMDON GRANGE WIPPET RACING TRACK TO RACE.THERE ARE DOG TRAPS SET OUT ON A TRACK TO PUT YOUR DOG IN.BEFORE PUTTING YOUR DOG IN YOU HAVE TO PUT A MUZZLE ON THE DOG'S MOUTH.THEN YOUR DOG IS READY TO GO, THE TRAPS OPEN AND THE DOG COMES OUT RUNNING TO CATCH A STUFFED RABBIT ON A ROPE.THE FIRST TO THE FINISH WINS.WHEN YOU WIN YOU GET A CUP OR SOME MONEY. YOU KEEP ON TRAINING YOUR DOG UNTIL IT IS SO FAST IT CAN CATCH A BIG HARE AND WHEN YOUR DOG IS TOO OLD TO RUN YOU STOP RACING. SIMON HODGSON.
